trans-unit.source: The CmsSigner class provides signing functionality.
trans-unit.target: CmsSigner-klassen innehåller funktioner för signering.

trans-unit.source: The CmsSigner constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"></xref> class by using a default subject identifier type.
trans-unit.target: CmsSigner konstruktorn skapar en instans av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"> </xref> klass med en identifierare ämnestyp.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner> class has the following default property values.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner>klassen har följande egenskapen standardvärden.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignerIdentifierType%2A>|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.DigestAlgorithm%2A>|1.3.14.3.2.26 (szOID_OIWSEC_sha1)| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption%2A>|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption> if <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignerIdentifierType%2A> is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType>,
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardvärde | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignerIdentifierType%2A>| <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.DigestAlgorithm%2A>|&1;.3.14.3.2.26 (szOID_OIWSEC_sha1) | | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption%2A>| <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption> if <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignerIdentifierType%2A> is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType>,</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignerIdentifierType%2A></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption%2A></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.DigestAlgorithm%2A></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignerIdentifierType%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption> otherwise|
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption>Annars |</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption>

trans-unit.source: The CmsSigner constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"></xref> class with the specified cryptographic service provider (CSP) parameters.
trans-unit.target: CmsSigner konstruktorn skapar en instans av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"> </xref> klass med parametrarna angivna cryptographic service provider (CSP).

trans-unit.source: CmsSigner is useful when you know the specific CSP and private key to use for signing.
trans-unit.target: CmsSigner är användbart när du känner till specifika CSP och privat nyckel som ska användas för signering.

trans-unit.source: For the default property values used with this constructor, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.%23ctor>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen standardvärdena används tillsammans med den här konstruktorn finns <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.%23ctor>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.%23ctor>

trans-unit.source: An exception to those values when this constructor is used is that <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption%2A> is set to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Ett undantag till dessa värden när du använder den här konstruktorn är den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption%2A>är inställd på <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"></xref> object that represents the set of CSP parameters to use.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters"> </xref> objekt som representerar en uppsättning CSP parametrar som ska användas.

trans-unit.source: The CmsSigner constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"></xref> class with the specified subject identifier type.
trans-unit.target: CmsSigner konstruktorn skapar en instans av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"> </xref> klass med angivna Ämnesidentifierarens typ.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the signer identifier type.
trans-unit.target: En medlem i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"> </xref> uppräkning som anger hur undertecknarens identifierare.

trans-unit.source: The CmsSigner constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"></xref> class with the specified signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: CmsSigner konstruktorn skapar en instans av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"> </xref> klass med angivna signeringscertifikatet.

trans-unit.source: For the default property values used with this constructor, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.%23ctor>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen standardvärdena används tillsammans med den här konstruktorn finns <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.%23ctor>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.%23ctor>

trans-unit.source: The signing certificate specified by the `certificate` parameter is not checked for validity on input.
trans-unit.target: Signeringscertifikatet som anges av den `certificate` parametern inte är markerat för giltigheten på indata.

trans-unit.source: To validate the certificate prior to supplying it to this constructor, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.Build%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Använd för att validera certifikatet innan du levererar till den här konstruktorn i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.Build%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metod.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.Build%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object that represents the signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objekt som representerar signeringscertifikatet.

trans-unit.source: The CmsSigner constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"></xref> class with the specified signer identifier type and signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: CmsSigner konstruktorn skapar en instans av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"> </xref> klass med de angivna Signerare identifierare signeringscertifikat.

trans-unit.source: The signing certificate specified by the `certificate` parameter is not checked for validity on input.
trans-unit.target: Signeringscertifikatet som anges av den `certificate` parametern inte är markerat för giltigheten på indata.

trans-unit.source: To validate the certificate prior to supplying it to this constructor, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.Build%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Använd för att validera certifikatet innan du levererar till den här konstruktorn i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.Build%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metod.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain.Build%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the signer identifier type.
trans-unit.target: En medlem i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"> </xref> uppräkning som anger hur undertecknarens identifierare.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object that represents the signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objekt som representerar signeringscertifikatet.

trans-unit.source: The Certificate property sets or retrieves the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object that represents the signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen certifikat hämtar eller anger den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objekt som representerar signeringscertifikatet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object that represents the signing certificate.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> objekt som representerar signeringscertifikatet.

trans-unit.source: The Certificates property retrieves the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> collection that contains certificates associated with the message to be signed.
trans-unit.target: Certifikat egenskapen hämtar den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> samling som innehåller certifikat som är associerade med meddelandet ska vara signerade.

trans-unit.source: This property may be used to hold certificates in the signer's certificate chain.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen kan användas för att lagra certifikat i certifikatkedjan undertecknarens.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the certificates included in the collection are determined by the setting of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: I det här fallet certifikat som ingår i samlingen fastställs av inställningen för den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.IncludeOption%2A>

trans-unit.source: Not all certificates in the signer's certificate chain are necessarily present in Certificates.
trans-unit.target: Inte alla certifikat i certifikatkedjan undertecknarens finns alltid i certifikat.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> collection that represents the collection of certificates associated with the message to be signed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> samling som representerar insamling av certifikat som är associerad med meddelandet ska vara signerade.

trans-unit.source: The DigestAlgorithm property sets or retrieves the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref> that represents the hash algorithm used with the signature.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DigestAlgorithm hämtar eller anger den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"> </xref> som representerar den hashalgoritm som används med signatur.

trans-unit.source: For the default value of this property, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.%23ctor>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet för egenskapen finns <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.%23ctor>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.%23ctor>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"></xref> object that represents the hash algorithm used with the signature.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Oid"> </xref> objekt som representerar den hashalgoritm som används med signatur.

trans-unit.source: The IncludeOption property sets or retrieves the option that controls whether the root and entire chain associated with the signing certificate are included with the created CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IncludeOption anger eller hämtar det alternativ som styr om rot- och hela kedjan som är associerade med signeringscertifikatet medföljer skapade CMS/PKCS #7-meddelandet.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption"></xref> enumeration that specifies how much of the X509 certificate chain should be included in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En medlem i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption"> </xref> uppräkning som anger hur mycket av X509 certifikatkedja ska tas med i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: The IncludeOption property can be one of the following <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption"></xref> members.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IncludeOption kan vara något av följande <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509IncludeOption"> </xref> medlemmar.

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: Namn

trans-unit.source: Value Meaning
trans-unit.target: Värde betydelse

trans-unit.source: 0 The certificate chain is not included.
trans-unit.target: 0 certifikatkedjan ingår inte.

trans-unit.source: 1 The certificate chain, except for the root certificate, is included.
trans-unit.target: 1 certifikatkedjan, förutom rotcertifikatet, ingår.

trans-unit.source: 2 Only the end certificate is included.
trans-unit.target: 2 endast slutcertifikatet ingår.

trans-unit.source: 3 The certificate chain, including the root certificate, is included.
trans-unit.target: 3 certifikatkedjan, inklusive rotcertifikatet, ingår.

trans-unit.source: One of the arguments provided to a method was not valid.
trans-unit.target: Ett av argumenten som angetts för en metod var inte giltig.

trans-unit.source: The SignedAttributes property retrieves the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection"></xref> collection of signed attributes to be associated with the resulting <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"></xref> content.
trans-unit.target: SignedAttributes egenskapen hämtar den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection"> </xref> samling signerade attribut som ska associeras med den resulterande <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"> </xref> innehåll.

trans-unit.source: Signed attributes are signed along with the specified content.
trans-unit.target: Signerade attribut är signerade tillsammans med det angivna innehållet.

trans-unit.source: An example of a signed attribute that might be included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection> collection retrieved by the SignedAttributes property is the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> signing time attribute.
trans-unit.target: Ett exempel på ett signerat-attribut som kan ingå i den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection>samling som hämtas av egenskapen SignedAttributes är den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime>signering tid attribut.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType> object and a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest> object will be automatically generated and placed in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the corresponding signer whenever the SignedAttributes property is not empty.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType>objekt och en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest>objektet automatiskt skapas och placeras i den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-egenskapen för motsvarande undertecknare när egenskapen SignedAttributes inte är tom.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection"></xref> collection that represents the signed attributes.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection"> </xref> samling som representerar de signerade attribut.

trans-unit.source: If there are no signed attributes, the property is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Om det finns inga signerade attribut, är egenskapen en tom samling.

trans-unit.source: The SignerIdentifierType property sets or retrieves the type of the identifier of the signer.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SignerIdentifierType anger eller hämtar typ av identifierare undertecknarens.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"></xref> enumeration that specifies the type of the identifier of the signer.
trans-unit.target: En medlem i den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType"> </xref> uppräkning som anger hur undertecknarens identifierare.

trans-unit.source: One of the arguments provided to a method was not valid.
trans-unit.target: Ett av argumenten som angetts för en metod var inte giltig.

trans-unit.source: The UnsignedAttributes property retrieves the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection"></xref> collection of unsigned PKCS #9 attributes to be associated with the resulting <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"></xref> content.
trans-unit.target: UnsignedAttributes egenskapen hämtar den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection"> </xref> samling osignerade PKCS 9-attribut som ska associeras med den resulterande <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"> </xref> innehåll.

trans-unit.source: Unsigned attributes can be modified without invalidating the signature.
trans-unit.target: Osignerade attribut kan ändras signaturen ogiltig.

trans-unit.source: An example of an unsigned attribute that might be included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection> collection retrieved by the UnsignedAttributes property is a countersignature.
trans-unit.target: Ett exempel på ett osignerat attribut som kan ingå i den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection>samling som hämtas av egenskapen UnsignedAttributes är en kontrasignatur har.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection"></xref> collection that represents the unsigned attributes.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection"> </xref> samling som representerar osignerade attribut.

trans-unit.source: If there are no unsigned attributes, the property is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Om det finns inga osignerade attribut, är egenskapen en tom samling.
